item.title: BdPMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g36910 Gene Symbol: BdPMT Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Stacking AsFMT overexpression with BdPMT loss of function enhances monolignol ferulate production in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: IbLEA14
